original: @475b / /rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @475b / /rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: a'arya koo shi ka pradzny'a p'a ra mi t'a /
analyzed: a'arya koo shi ka pradzny'a p'a ra mi t'a /
translated: Ārya-Kauśikaprajñāpāramitā

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa koo shi ka zhes bya ba /
analyzed: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa koo shi ka zhes bya ba /
translated: Ārya-Kauśika-prajñāpāramitā

original: sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to all the Buddhas and Bodhisattvas.

original: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
analyzed: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
translated: Thus have I heard at one time.

original: bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na /
translated: The Blessed One was dwelling in Rājagṛha,

original: bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'bum @476a *//
analyzed: bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'bum @476a *//
translated: on Vulture Peak Mountain, together with a great assembly of monks and many hundreds of thousands of bodhisattvas,

original: phrag du ma thams cad kyang gzhon nur gyur pa sha stag dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs ste /
analyzed: phrag du ma thams cad kyang gzhon nur gyur pa sha stag dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs ste /
translated: all of whom were youthful.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la bka' stsal pa /
translated: Then the Blessed One said to Śakra, Lord of the Gods:

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: Kauśika,

original: de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don ni 'di yin te /
translated: the meaning of the perfection of wisdom is this:

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su blta bar mi bya /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su blta bar mi bya /
translated: The perfection of wisdom should not be viewed dualistically.

original: gnyis ma yin par yang ma yin /
analyzed: gnyis ma yin par yang ma yin /
translated: It is not both.

original: mtshan mar ma yin /🔽mtshan ma ma yin par yang ma yin /
analyzed: mtshan mar ma yin / mtshan ma ma yin par yang ma yin /
translated: It is not a sign.🔽It is not not a sign.

original: blang bar ma yin /
analyzed: blang bar ma yin /
translated: It is not to be adopted.

original: dor bar ma yin /🔽bsnan par ma yin /
analyzed: dor bar ma yin / bsnan par ma yin /
translated: It is not to be rejected.🔽It is not to be added.

original: bsnan pa med par yang ma yin /🔽kun nas nyon mongs par ma yin /
analyzed: bsnan pa med par yang ma yin / kun nas nyon mongs par ma yin /
translated: It is not not to be added.🔽It is not afflicted.

original: kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin par yang ma yin /🔽rnam par byang ba ma yin /
analyzed: kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin par yang ma yin / rnam par byang ba ma yin /
translated: It is not unafflicted.🔽It is not purified.

original: rnam par byang ba ma yin par yang ma yin /🔽spang bar ma yin /
analyzed: rnam par byang ba ma yin par yang ma yin / spang bar ma yin /
translated: It is not not purified.🔽It is not to be abandoned.

original: spang bar ma yin par yang ma yin /🔽gnas su ma yin /
analyzed: spang bar ma yin par yang ma yin / gnas su ma yin /
translated: It is not not to be abandoned.🔽It is not a basis.

original: gnas su ma yin par yang ma yin /🔽sbyor bar ma yin /
analyzed: gnas su ma yin par yang ma yin / sbyor bar ma yin /
translated: It is not not a basis.🔽It is not to be applied.

original: sbyor bar ma yin par yang ma yin /🔽'brel bar ma yin /
analyzed: sbyor bar ma yin par yang ma yin / 'brel bar ma yin /
translated: It is not not to be applied.🔽It is not a connection.

original: 'brel par ma yin par yang ma yin /
analyzed: 'brel par ma yin par yang ma yin /
translated: It is not not a connection.

original: rkyen du ma yin /🔽rkyen du ma yin par yang ma yin /🔽chos su ma yin /
analyzed: rkyen du ma yin / rkyen du ma yin par yang ma yin / chos su ma yin /
translated: It is not a condition.🔽It is not not a condition.🔽It is not a phenomenon.

original: chos ma yin par yang ma yin /🔽de bzhin nyid ma yin /
analyzed: chos ma yin par yang ma yin / de bzhin nyid ma yin /
translated: It is not not a phenomenon.🔽It is not suchness.

original: de bzhin nyid ma yin par yang ma yin /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid ma yin par yang ma yin /
translated: It is not not suchness.

original: yang @476b dag pa'i mtha' ma yin /
analyzed: yang @476b dag pa'i mtha' ma yin /
translated: It is not the limit of reality.

original: yang dag pa'i mtha' ma yin par yang ma yin no //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i mtha' ma yin par yang ma yin no //
translated: It is not not the limit of reality.

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: Kauśika,

original: de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don ni /
analyzed: de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don ni /
translated: in the same way, the meaning of the perfection of wisdom

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: is as follows:

original: chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid mnyam mo //
analyzed: chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid mnyam mo //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is the same because all phenomena are the same.

original: chos thams cad zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo //
analyzed: chos thams cad zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is profound because all phenomena are profound.

original: chos thams cad dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben no //🔽chos thams cad g-yo ba med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa g-yo ba med pa'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben no // chos thams cad g-yo ba med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa g-yo ba med pa'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is isolated because all phenomena are isolated.🔽The perfection of wisdom is unmoving because all phenomena are unmoving.

original: chos thams cad rlom sems med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rlom sems med do //
analyzed: chos thams cad rlom sems med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rlom sems med do //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is without conceit because all phenomena are without conceit.

original: chos thams cad 'jigs pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jigs pa med do //
analyzed: chos thams cad 'jigs pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jigs pa med do //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is fearless because all phenomena are fearless.

original: chos thams cad bag tsha ba med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bag tsha ba med do //
analyzed: chos thams cad bag tsha ba med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bag tsha ba med do //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is without fear because all phenomena are without fear.

original: chos thams cad ro gcig pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ro gcig go /
analyzed: chos thams cad ro gcig pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ro gcig go /
translated: The perfection of wisdom is of one taste because all phenomena are of one taste.

original: chos thams cad skye ba med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba med do //
analyzed: chos thams cad skye ba med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba med do //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is non-arisen because all phenomena are non-arisen.

original: chos thams cad 'gag pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'gag pa med do //
analyzed: chos thams cad 'gag pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'gag pa med do //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is unceasing because all phenomena are unceasing.

original: chos thams cad nam mkha' lta bu'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nam mkha' lta bu'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad nam mkha' lta bu'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nam mkha' lta bu'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is like space because all phenomena are like space.

original: gzugs mu med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med do //🔽de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang / @477a *//
analyzed: gzugs mu med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med do // de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang / @477a *//
translated: The perfection of wisdom is boundless because form is boundless.🔽Similarly, the perfection of wisdom is boundless because feeling, perception, formation,

original: rnam par shes pa mu med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med do //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa mu med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med do //
translated: and consciousness are boundless.

original: sa'i khams mu med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med do //
analyzed: sa'i khams mu med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med do //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is boundless because the earth element is boundless.

original: de bzhin du chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams mu med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med do //
analyzed: de bzhin du chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams mu med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med do //
translated: Similarly, the perfection of wisdom is boundless because the water element, the fire element, the wind element, the space element, and the consciousness element are boundless.

original: rgya mtsho mu med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med do //
analyzed: rgya mtsho mu med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med do //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is boundless because the ocean is boundless.

original: rdo rje mnyam pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam mo; ;chos thams cad dbyer med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dbyer med do //
analyzed: rdo rje mnyam pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam mo; ;chos thams cad dbyer med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dbyer med do //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is the same because the vajra is the same. The perfection of wisdom is indivisible because all phenomena are indivisible.

original: chos thams cad ngo bo nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid dmigs su med do //
analyzed: chos thams cad ngo bo nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid dmigs su med do //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is non-apprehensible because the essence of all phenomena is non-apprehensible.

original: chos thams cad bsal ba med par mnyam pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsal ba med par mnyam mo; ;chos thams cad byed pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa byed pa med do //🔽chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab bo //
analyzed: chos thams cad bsal ba med par mnyam pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsal ba med par mnyam mo; ;chos thams cad byed pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa byed pa med do // chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab bo //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is equal to the unequaled because all phenomena are equal to the unequaled.🔽The perfection of wisdom is unequaled because all phenomena are unequaled.🔽The original: de bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa @477b dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
analyzed: de bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa @477b dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
translated: The perfection of wisdom is equal to the unequaled because all phenomena are equal to the unequaled. The perfection of wisdom is without increase because all phenomena are without increase. The perfection of wisdom is without decrease because all phenomena are without decrease. The perfection of wisdom is without defilement because all phenomena are without defilement. The perfection of wisdom is without purification because all phenomena are without purification. The perfection of wisdom is without annihilation because all phenomena are without annihilation. The perfection of wisdom is without permanence because all phenomena are without permanence. The perfection of wisdom is without identity because all phenomena are without identity. The perfection of wisdom is without difference because all phenomena are without difference. The perfection of wisdom is without duality because all phenomena are without duality. The perfection of wisdom is without discrimination because all phenomena are without discrimination. The perfection of wisdom is without conceptualization because all phenomena are without conceptualization. original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'khor gsum yongs su dag pas mu med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med do //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'khor gsum yongs su dag pas mu med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med do //
translated: The perfection of wisdom, the perfection of method, the perfection of aspiration, the perfection of strength, and the perfection of wisdom are boundless because of the boundlessness of the three spheres.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid bco brgyad de /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid bco brgyad de /
translated: The perfection of wisdom is as follows: there are eighteen kinds of emptiness.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: They are as follows:

original: nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /
translated: inner emptiness, outer emptiness, inner and outer emptiness, emptiness of emptiness, great emptiness, ultimate emptiness, emptiness of the conditioned,

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang / tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang / tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /
translated: The emptiness of the conditioned, the emptiness of the unconditioned, the emptiness of what is beyond extremes, the emptiness of what is endless and beginningless, the emptiness of non-rejection, the emptiness of inherent existence, the emptiness of all phenomena,

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de /
translated: the emptiness of defining characteristics, the emptiness of non-apprehension, the emptiness of non-entities, the emptiness of essential nature, and the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities.

original: mdor na / stong pa nyid 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o //🔽skar ma rab rib mar me dang // sgyu ma zil pa chu bur dang // rmi lam glog dang sprin @478a *//
analyzed: mdor na / stong pa nyid 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o // skar ma rab rib mar me dang // sgyu ma zil pa chu bur dang // rmi lam glog dang sprin @478a *//
translated: In short, this emptiness is called the perfection of wisdom.🔽Like stars, like a mirage, like a lamp,🔽like an illusion, like dew, like a bubble,🔽like a dream, like a flash of lightning,

original: lta bu // 'dus byas de ltar blta bar bya //
analyzed: lta bu // 'dus byas de ltar blta bar bya //
translated: like a cloud,

original: na ma bha ga ba tyee a'arya pradzny'a b'a ra mi ta ye /
analyzed: na ma bha ga ba tyee a'arya pradzny'a b'a ra mi ta ye /
translated: Homage to the Blessed Noble Perfection of Wisdom.

original: aom dh'i:hr'i: shr'i shu ti smri ti ma ti ga te bi dza ya sv'ah'a /🔽'gag pa med cing skye med la //
analyzed: aom dh'i:hr'i: shr'i shu ti smri ti ma ti ga te bi dza ya sv'ah'a / 'gag pa med cing skye med la //
translated: Oṃ dhīḥ hrīḥ śrīḥ śruti smṛti mati gate vijaya svāhā.🔽Unceasing and unborn,

original: chad pa med cing rtag pa med //
analyzed: chad pa med cing rtag pa med //
translated: Not annihilated and not eternal,

original: tha dad don min don gcig min //
analyzed: tha dad don min don gcig min //
translated: Not the same and not different,

original: 'ong ba med cing 'gro med la //
analyzed: 'ong ba med cing 'gro med la //
translated: Not coming and not going,

original: spros bzhi bas zhi ba yi //
analyzed: spros bzhi bas zhi ba yi //
translated: Pacified of the four elaborations,

original: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ston pa //
analyzed: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ston pa //
translated: The teacher of dependent origination,

original: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang yin pa //
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang yin pa //
translated: The perfect Buddha,

original: smra mchog de la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: smra mchog de la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: I pay homage to that supreme speaker.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas /🔽tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas / tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste /
translated: The Blessed One having spoken thus,

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
translated: the Venerable Śāriputra, Śakra, Lord of the Gods, the monks, the bodhisattvas, and the world with its gods, humans, asuras, and gandharvas rejoiced and praised the Blessed One's words.

original: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa koo shi ka zhes bya ba rdzogs so ////
analyzed: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa koo shi ka zhes bya ba rdzogs so ////
translated: The noble perfection of wisdom called Kauśika is completed.
